刧字的基本解释

刧
jié
古同“劫”。

刧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jié］
［《廣韻》居怯切，入業，見。］
亦作“刦1”。亦作“刧1”。亦作“刼1”。
(1)威逼；胁迫。
(2)抢夺；强取。
(3)指盗贼，劫匪。
(4)佛教名词。梵文kalpa的音译，“劫波”（或“劫簸”）的略称。意为极久远的时节。古印度传说世界经历若干万年毁灭一次，重新再开始，这样一个周期叫做一“劫”。“劫”的时间长短，佛经有各种不同的说法。一“劫”包括“成”、“住”、“坏”、“空”四个时期，叫做“四劫”。到“坏劫”时，有水、火、风三灾出现，世界归于毁灭。后人借指天灾人祸。
(5)围棋术语。黑白双方往复提吃对方一子称劫。
(6)通“級”。宫殿或塔的阶级。
(7)通“蜐”、“”。石蜐，即龟足，甲壳类动物。

刧字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【刀字部】　刧； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页138第15
【韻會】刦俗作刧。【荀子·王制篇】齊桓公刧於魯莊。又劫通作刧。

刧字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
刧字的起名意思

暂无。

Robbery
Basic explanation of words
Robbery
jié
Gu Tong "jumped".
Robbery
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jié］
["Guangyun" is timid, enters the industry, see you. ]
Also known as "Ji 1". Also known as "Ji 1". Also known as "刼1".
(1) Intimidation; coercion.
(2) Snatch; take by force.
(3) Refers to thieves and robbers.
(4) Buddhist terms. The transliteration of the Sanskrit kalpa, the abbreviation for "Jiebo" (or "Jiebao"). It means a very long time. The ancient Indian legendary world experienced destruction once in tens of thousands of years and started again. Such a cycle is called a "catastrophe." There are various sayings in the Buddhist scriptures regarding the length of the "jumping" period. The first "tribulation" includes four periods of "cheng", "stay", "bad", and "emptiness", which are called the "four tribulations." When it comes to "bad calamity", there will be three plagues of water, fire, and wind, and the world will be destroyed. Later generations refer to natural disasters and man-made disasters.
(5) Go terms. The black and white sides repeatedly mentioned and ate each other.
(6) Through "level". The class of palaces or towers.
(7) Through "蜐" and "". Stone scorpion, namely tortoise foot, crustacean.
